item.title: Silab client loader makes the client able to be reload on website
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Thanks

Also, the jar file that is ran is stored in the users temporary internet cache, and it stays in there when you reload, so it wont work, but when u empty ur temp internet cache (close all windows), it deletes all files including the jar file, so if u can find a way to delete a certain file from the users temp internet cache every time the page is loaded, it will work when refreshed. Just add the function in [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 08:33:43 am[/size][hr]Here is one possible way:
http://www.kixtart.org/forums/ubbthreads.php?ubb=showflat&Number=128714[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 08:42:34 am[/size][hr]i finally found a way!
OKOK , havenâ€™t tested, but change the format of your webclient page to .php, add this at the very top:

<?
header("Pragma: no-cache");
header("Cache: no-cahce");
?>

then upload to a PHP host to see it working!!!

Read full topic
